message_1:
What is the value of the binomial coefficient (n choose k) when n = 8 and k = 3?

Solution: (8 choose 3) = 8! / (3! * 5!) = 56. Therefore, the value of the binomial coefficient (n choose k) when n = 8 and k = 3 is 56.
message_2: You are correct. The value of the binomial coefficient (n choose k) when n = 8 and k = 3 is 56.
